title: Ghost Game..Please Help
body:
After a Match.The stats didn't want to load.So i clicked "skip waiting for Stats" and i restarted my League client so i can Reopen "My Shop"
Upon logging back in. my client think i'm in a game an automatically tries to connect me to the game that was completed when i clicked "skip waiting for Stats".If anyone Has any Fix please Help..Much appreciated - UniversalWeapon

replies.body: I know how you feel.. I just got a ghost game. RIP Wish I had a GA for the league client... {{item:3026}}

Yeeeeaaaaa this sounds like the definition of a ghost game alright. Essentially the game ended, but for whatever strange reason it hasn't been able to properly report the end of game to the servers yet. Honestly, your best bet is to wait a bit for that game to be properly reported. 

It's been about an hour since you posted this, have you been able to get back on and play normally yet?
I've just logged in an it's back to normal!! Thanks for asking ..means a a lot bro!!
